name: Kitty Cat Love
description:
Play as a lonely kitty trying to win the affection of his love. Collect items by battling cats and find your true love!

How to Play:

Download the project and unzip the contents. Double click the file called ValentinesGameJam (its an application file) and you're good to go!

Controls:

Use A and D to move left to right across the level to find the items.
Press E to enter conversation with your crush and to interact with the items.
Press R to exit conversation.
Press ESC to close the game.

This game was made over the course of 3 days, on and off so roughly 15  hours across those days just for some fun downtime, using Unity. All art assets were created by me for this project. 

Made for this jam:

https://itch.io/jam/gdl-valentines-jam

Any problems downloading just lemme know!
